trees.layout

Class ModelData

  • java.lang.Object
    • trees.layout.ModelData

  • public class ModelData
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for encapsulating the data of the wrapped objects.
    Author:
    Marcus Deininger

    • Method Detail

      • newElement

        public static ModelData newElement(java.lang.Object object,
                   java.lang.Class<?> cls,
                   java.lang.String label,
                   Style style)
        Factory method for wrapping a regular element.
        Parameters:
        object - - The object to be wrapped.
        cls - - The class of the wrapped object.
        label - - The original label of the object.
        style - - The displaying style.
        Returns:
        an initialized regular element.

      • newDuplicate

        public static ModelData newDuplicate(java.lang.Object object,
                     java.lang.Class<?> cls,
                     java.lang.String label,
                     Style style)
        Factory method for wrapping a duplicate element.
        Parameters:
        object - - The object to be wrapped.
        cls - - The class of the wrapped object.
        label - - The original label of the object.
        style - - The displaying style.
        Returns:
        an initialized element, which is marked as duplicate.

      • newPlaceHolder

        public static ModelData newPlaceHolder(java.lang.Class<?> cls,
                       Style style)
        Factory method for creating a placeholder element. The placeholder is not displayed but taken into account for the layout.
        Parameters:
        cls - - The class of the wrapped object.
        style - - The displaying style.
        Returns:
        an initialized element, which is marked as placeholder.

      • align

        public void align(Style style)
        Aligns the label of the object according to the given style. The label will fit into the drawing box of the node. If it is too large characters or lines will be removed.
        Parameters:
        style -
